data.name: 22yards
descriptions: ⚡ Developed a web application leveraging React.js and Next.js, providing users with the ability to register as players, umpires, scorers, and more.
⚡ Empowered players to create matches, reserve grounds, and book umpires and scorers for matches.
⚡ Implemented features allowing users to view match scores, histories, and rankings.
⚡ Enabled players to initiate tournaments and establish groups among teams.

data.name: The Retail Curator
descriptions: ⚡ This website caters to sellers looking to expand their online presence. Sellers purchase products from wholesale retailers and easily upload product details to multiple websites with just one click.
⚡ The admin portal, developed using React, provides seamless management of product uploads and other administrative tasks, streamlining the selling process for sellers and enhancing efficiency.

data.name: Reapmor
descriptions: ⚡ Developed a comprehensive solution bridging the gap between farmers and wholesale buyers.
⚡ Farmers can easily list their produce on the platform with detailed descriptions, photos, quantities, and prices.
⚡ They also have the option to update availability in real time, ensuring accurate and up-to-date information for buyers.
⚡ I have created a web portal using React.js for efficient management of sellers, seeds, farmer profiles, and financing advances.

⚡ This centralized platform enables seamless administration of various aspects of the agricultural supply chain, enhancing transparency and facilitating smoother transactions between farmers and wholesalers.
⚡ For mobile access, a React Native app was developed, providing farmers and buyers with a user-friendly interface to access the platform's features on the go.

data.name: Freshpiks
descriptions: ⚡ Developed an e-commerce application catering to wholesale vegetable buyers. Customers can easily browse and add vegetables to their cart, with options to adjust quantities.
⚡ The mobile app, built with Ionic, enables customers to easily add, remove, and update quantities in their carts, with automatic calculation of total price, discounts, and delivery charges.
⚡ The Angular-based web portal centralizes product management, quantities, and pricing for efficient inventory control and decision-making.

data.name: Yumelabs
descriptions: ⚡ I led the development of a high-performance, SEO-friendly website using Next.js, enhanced with engaging animations powered by GreenSock (GSAP).
⚡ The site will feature dynamic content and a seamless user experience, optimized for search engines and responsive across devices.
⚡ Server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) to improve search engine visibility. Use the next/head component for custom meta tags per page.
